events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to return it and get a refund because it doesn't fit properly.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund as the customer requests a return and money back.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle the customer's return request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket return. I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in the original packaging?
My order number is 987654321. The jacket is completely new and still in the original packaging as I just received it yesterday.
Thank you for the information. You are eligible for a full refund. Please use the prepaid return label sent to your email to ship the jacket back.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I'll send the jacket back today using the return label provided.
We have processed your refund request and the return shipment is underway. The refund will be credited once the item is received.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
The case has been closed as the refund was successfully issued and no further actions are required from your side.
